page.title: 05Events in Scremerston.
page.content: The two main events held each year in Scremerston are the{Church Garden {Party}held in the grounds of{Kiwi {Cottage,Scremerston}and the{Gala}held on the School Field. The Church Garden Party is organised by the Vicar and Church Council. The Gala was first held in 1977 when a group of parents got together to organise the Jubilee Celebrations. Now it is organised by a committee of the various organisations in the area of the village and all the proceeds are shared by these clubs and organisations. Each organisation puts on a stall or sideshow but most of the work is done by the{Parents' Association}of the School and the Youth Club. Page 6 gives full details of the Gala held in 1985 and this account was written by the children of the School.
